text: Mofavremo nerera ami anivazu hiaza nehunka, maka kokantega vahe'mokizmi knare'nare feno zantamine kini vahemokizmi feno zanena erigahane. E'inama nehanagenka kagrama kenka antahinkama hananana, Jekopu nagamofo hankave nentake Anumzankino, nagu nevazino nahokeno ete navre'nea Ra Anumzane hunka hugahane.
